description: Defensive position on hands and knees protecting neck and staying tight
key_points: Hands and knees position|Chin tucked protecting neck|Elbows tight to body|Ready to escape or defend

description: Escaping turtle by posting hands and swinging leg through to face opponent
key_points: Post hands on mat|Swing far leg through|Circle to face opponent|Recover guard or stand

description: Rolling escape from turtle using shoulder-to-shoulder motion to face opponent
key_points: Roll shoulder-to-shoulder NOT over neck|Drive hips toward opponent|Come to guard|Maintain awareness

description: Gi choke from turtle walking around opponent's head like clock hands
key_points: Far arm grips far collar|Walk around toward trapped arm|Sit hip in front of shoulder|Squeeze and walk more
common_mistakes: Wrong collar|Not walking|Hip wrong place|Loose grip

description: Technical standup from turtle position to return to neutral standing
key_points: Protect neck with hands|Step one foot up|Drive off foot to stand|Face opponent immediately

description: Wrestling escape trapping opponent's arm and rolling to take back or escape
key_points: Trap far arm|Roll toward trapped arm|Take back or escape|Maintain control throughout
common_mistakes: Not trapping arm|Wrong roll direction|Slow|Losing control

description: Rolling forward to escape turtle and recover guard
key_points: Tuck chin|Roll forward|Come to guard|Face opponent immediately
common_mistakes: Neck exposed during roll|Slow|Poor direction|Not recovering guard

description: Taking back from turtle by sitting to side with seatbelt control
key_points: Secure seatbelt grip|Sit to side (chair sit)|Pull opponent into lap|Insert hooks
common_mistakes: Sitting wrong way|Losing seatbelt|No hooks|Poor timing

description: Trapping one arm with legs and other with arms forming T shape
key_points: One arm trapped with legs|Other arm controlled with arms|Perpendicular T position|Attack with chokes
common_mistakes: Arms not trapped|Poor position|Loose control|Opponent escaping

description: Eddie Bravo spinal lock from truck position rotating head opposite direction
key_points: From truck position|Control at neck|Rotate head opposite of hips|Spinal torque finish
common_mistakes: Wrong position|Not controlling head|Insufficient rotation|Illegal in IBJJF

description: Taking back by rolling over from turtle position with seatbelt
key_points: Secure seatbelt|Roll over your shoulder|Pull opponent with you|Insert hooks during roll

description: Quick choke attacking exposed neck from turtle position
key_points: Arm around exposed neck|Secure grip quickly|Compress throat|Finish with squeeze

description: Wrestling position controlling turtle with spiral motion and breakdown
key_points: Arm around waist|Spiral motion control|Break down to mat|Transition to back or other position

description: Hell strangle choke from crucifix position
key_points: From crucifix, arm around neck|Compress throat with arm|Use leg pressure|Squeeze to finish
common_mistakes: Not in crucifix|Loose grip|Poor angle|Arms not trapped

description: Transitioning from turtle back to guard position
key_points: Create space with movement|Insert hook or sit through|Recover guard|Face opponent

description: Neck attack from turtle (generally illegal in competition)
key_points: Control at head|Apply neck pressure|Force chin to chest|Neck torque

description: Using arm drag from turtle to escape and take back or stand
key_points: Grip opponent's arm|Drag across body|Escape to back or stand|Maintain control

description: Switching hips from turtle to recover guard quickly
key_points: From turtle, switch hips|Sit through to guard|Face opponent|Establish guard quickly
